text: Willem "Wim" Kok (September 29, 1938 - October 20, 2018) was a politician and former trade unionist from the Netherlands. He represented the Labour Party (PvdA). He served as Prime Minister of the Netherlands from August 22, 1994 until July 22, 2002. Wim Kok (1938) Biografie, Absolutefacts.nl, June 4, 2010 Wim Kok: bezuiniger tegen wil en dank, Elsevier, March 29, 2012 Kok was born in Bergambacht in South Holland. Kok died on October 20, 2018 in Amsterdam from heart failure at the age of 80.Former Dutch prime minister, Wim Kok, dies at 80 ==References== ==Other websites== * W.
